Martín Luque.

I'm a software developer. Currently, I'm studying a double degree of Computer Science and Mathematics at the University of Granada.

Projects.

Falling Gems

Falling Gems is a simple game I'm developing for iOS. The goal is to help a man named Frank collect the gems that fall from the sky by dragging him across the screen.
